name: data-be-analyse-1h-long1
open_rule1: res[0].low < res[0].bb_200[1] and perc_diff(res[0].bb_200[1], res[0].EMA_50) > 3 and res[0].EMA_50 > res[1].EMA_50 > res[2].EMA_50
open_rule4: agg.empty_count < 1 and agg.candle_size/agg.avg_candles > 2 and res[0].close < res[0].open and agg.candle_size > 5 and res[0].close > res[0].open and agg.candle_size > 1 and (res[0].low < res[0].bb_200[2] or res[1].low < res[1].bb_200[2])
